title: Riding of animals or manual / automated vehicles or any animal drawn carts for the purposes of entertainment shall be prohibited
clause_text: Riding of animals or manual / automated vehicles or any animal drawn carts for the purposes of entertainment shall be prohibited. Water sports, golf, balloon rides, paragliding, ropeway etc. shall not be allowed. Use of area for entertainment, sports, film shooting shall be prohibited.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Riding of animals or manual / automated vehicles or any animal drawn carts for the purposes of entertainment shall be prohibited.
